participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

YRBSHS_01.LongName: <u>When you rode a bicycle</u> during the past 12 months, how often did you wear a helmet?

Levels.1: I did not ride a bicycle during the past 12 months
Levels.5: Most of the time wore a helmet

YRBSHS_02.LongName: How often do you wear a seat belt when <u>riding</u> in a car driven by someone else?

YRBSHS_03.LongName: During the past 30 days, how many times did you <u>ride</u> in a car or other vehicle <u>driven by someone who had been drinking alcohol</u>?

YRBSHS_04.LongName: During the past 30 days, how many times did you <u>drive</u> a car or other vehicle <u>when you had been drinking alcohol</u>?

YRBSHS_05.LongName: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you carry <u>a weapon</u> such as a gun, knife, or club?

YRBSHS_06.LongName: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you carry <u>a gun</u>?

YRBSHS_07.LongName: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you carry a weapon such as a gun, knife, or club <u>on school property</u>?

YRBSHS_08.LongName: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you <u>not</u> go to school because you felt you would be unsafe at school or on your way to or from school?

YRBSHS_9.LongName: During the past 12 months, how many times has someone threatened or injured you with a weapon such as a gun, knife, or club <u>on school property</u>?

YRBSHS_10.LongName: During the past 12 months, how many times were you in a physical fight?

YRBSHS_11.LongName: During the past 12 months, how many times were you in a physical fight in which you were injured and had to be treated by a doctor or nurse?

YRBSHS_12.LongName: During the past 12 months, how many times were you in a physical fight <u>on school property</u>?

YRBSHS_13.LongName: During the past 12 months, did your boyfriend or girlfriend ever hit, slap, or physically hurt you on purpose?

YRBSHS_14.LongName: Have you ever been physically forced to have sexual intercourse when you did not want to?

YRBSHS_15.LongName: During the past 12 months, have you ever been bullied <u>on school property</u>?

YRBSHS_16.LongName: During the past 12 months, have you ever been <u>electronically</u> bullied? (Include being bullied through e-mail, chat rooms, instant messaging, Web sites, or texting.)

YRBSHS_17.LongName: During the past 12 months, did you ever feel so sad or hopeless almost every day for <u>two weeks or more in a row</u> that you stopped doing some usual activities?

YRBSHS_18.LongName: During the past 12 months, did you ever <u>seriously</u> consider attempting suicide?

YRBSHS_19.LongName: During the past 12 months, did you make a plan about how you would attempt suicide?

YRBSHS_20.LongName: During the past 12 months, how many times did you actually attempt suicide?

YRBSHS_21.LongName: <u> If you attempted suicide</u> during the past 12 months, did any attempt result in an injury, poisoning, or overdose that had to be treated by a doctor or nurse?

YRBSHS_22.LongName: Have you ever tried cigarette smoking, even one or two puffs?

YRBSHS_23.LongName: How old were you when you smoke a whole cigarette for the first time?

Levels.1: I have never smoked a whole cigarette

YRBSHS_24.LongName: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you smoke cigarettes?

YRBSHS_25.LongName: During the past 30 days, on  the days you smoked, how many cigarettes did you smoke <u>per day</u>?

Levels.1: I did not smoke cigarettes during the past 30 days

YRBSHS_26.LongName: During the past 30 days, how did you <u>usually</u> get your own cigarettes? (Select only <u>one</u> response.)

Levels.1: I did not smoke cigarettes during the past 30 days
Levels.2: I bought them in a store such as a convenience store, supermarket, discount store, or gas station
Levels.3: I bought them from a vending machine
Levels.4: I gave someone else money to buy them for me
Levels.5: I borrowed (or bummed) them from someone else
Levels.6: A person 18 years old or older gave them to me
Levels.7: I took them from a store or family member
Levels.8: I got them some other way

YRBSHS_27.LongName: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you smoke cigarettes <u>on school property</u>?

YRBSHS_28.LongName: Have you ever smoked cigarettes daily, that is, at least one cigarette every day for 30 days?

YRBSHS_29.LongName: During the past 12 months, did you ever try <u>to quit</u> smoking cigarettes?

Levels.1: I did not smoke cigarettes during the past 12 months

YRBSHS_30.LongName: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you use <u>chewing tobacco, snuff, or dip,</u> such as Redman, Levi Garrett, Beechnut, Skoal, Skoal Bandits, or Copenhagen?

YRBSHS_31.LongName: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you use <u>chewing tobacco, snuff, or dip on school property</u>?

YRBSHS_32.LongName: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you smoke <u>cigars, cigarillos, or little cigars</u>?

YRBSHS_33.LongName: During your life, on how many days have you had at least one drink of alcohol?

YRBSHS_34.LongName: How old were you when you had your first drink of alcohol other than a few sips?

Levels.1: I have never had a drink of alcohol other than a few sips

YRBSHS_35.LongName: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you have at least one drink of alcohol?

YRBSHS_36.LongName: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you have 5 or more drinks of alcohol in a row, that is, within a couple of hours?

YRBSHS_37.LongName: During the past 30 days, how did you <u>usually</u> get the alcohol you drank?

Levels.1: I did not drink alcohol during the past 30 days
Levels.2: I bought it in a store such as a liquor store, convenience store, supermarket, discount store, or gas station
Levels.3: I bought it in a restaurant, bar, or club
Levels.4: I bought it at a public event such as a concert or sporting event
Levels.5: I gave someone else money to buy it for me
Levels.7: I took it from a store or family member
Levels.8: I got it some other way

YRBSHS_38.LongName: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you have at least one drink of alcohol <u>on school property</u>?

YRBSHS_39.LongName: During your life, how many times have you used marijuana?

YRBSHS_40.LongName: How old were you when you tried marijuana for the first time?

YRBSHS_41.LongName: During the past 30 days, how many times did you use marijuana?

YRBSHS_42.LongName: During the past 30 days, how many times did you use marijuana <u>on school property</u>?

YRBSHS_43.LongName: During your life, how many times have you used <u>any</u> form of cocaine, including powder, crack, or freebase?

YRBSHS_44.LongName: During the past 30 days, how many times did you use <u>any</u> form of cocaine, including powder, crack, or freebase?

YRBSHS_45.LongName: During your life, how many times have you sniffed glue, breathed the contents of aerosol spray cans, or inhaled any paints or sprays to get high?

YRBSHS_46.LongName: During your life, how many times have you used <u>heroin</u> (also called smack, junk, or China White)?

YRBSHS_47.LongName: During your life, how many times have you used <u>methamphetamines</u> (also called speed, crystal, crank, or ice)?

YRBSHS_48.LongName: During your life, how many times have you used <u>ecstasy</u> (also called MDMA)?

YRBSHS_49.LongName: During your life, how many times have you taken <u>steroid pills or shots</u> without a doctor's prescription?

YRBSHS_50.LongName: During your life, how many times have you taken a <u>prescription drug</u> (such as OxyContin, Percocet, Vicodin, codeine, Adderall, Ritalin, or Xanax) without a doctor's prescription?

YRBSHS_51.LongName: During you life, how many times have you used a needle to inject any <u>illegal</u> drug into your body?

YRBSHS_52.LongName: During the past 12 months, has anyone offered, sold, or given you an illegal drug <u>on school property</u>?

YRBSHS_53.LongName: Have you ever had sexual intercourse?

YRBSHS_54.LongName: How old were you when you had sexual intercourse for the first time?

Levels.1: I have never had sexual intercourse

YRBSHS_55.LongName: During your life, with how many people have you had sexual intercourse?

Levels.1: I have never had sexual intercourse

YRBSHS_56.LongName: During the past 3 months, with how many people did you have sexual intercourse?

Levels.1: I have never had sexual intercourse
Levels.2: I have had sexual intercourse, but not during the past 3 months

YRBSHS_57.LongName: Did you drink alcohol or use drugs before you had sexual intercourse the <u>last time</u>?

Levels.1: I have never had sexual intercourse

YRBSHS_58.LongName: The <u>last time</u> you had sexual intercourse, did you or your partner use a condom?

Levels.1: I have never had sexual intercourse

YRBSHS_59.LongName: The <u>last time</u> you had sexual intercourse, what <u>one</u> method did you or your partner use to <u>prevent pregnancy</u>? (Select only <u>one</u> response.)

Levels.1: I have never had sexual intercourse
Levels.2: No method was used to prevent pregnancy
Levels.5: Depo-Provera (or any injectable birth control), Nuva Ring (or any birth control ring, Implanon (or any implant), or any IUD

YRBSHS_61.LongName: Which of the following are you trying to do about your weight?

Levels.4: I am <u>not trying to do anything</u> about my weight

YRBSHS_62.LongName: During the past 30 days, did you <u>go without eating for 24 hours or more</u> (also called fasting) to lose weight or keep from gaining weight?

YRBSHS_63.LongName: During the past 30 days, did you <u>take any diet pills, powders, or liquids</u> without a doctor's advice to lose weight or to keep from gaining weight? (Do <u>not</u> include meal replacement products such as Slim Fast)

YRBSHS_64.LongName: During the past 30 days, did you <u>vomit or take laxatives</u> to lose weight or to keep from gaining weight?

YRBSHS_65.LongName: During the past 7 days, how many times did you drink <u>100% fruit juices</u> such as orange juice, apple juice, or grape juice? (Do <u>not</u> count punch, Kool-Aid, sports drinks, or other fruit-flavored drinks.)

Levels.1: I did not drink 100% fruit juice during the past 7 days
Levels.2: 1 to 3 times during the past 7 days
Levels.3: 4 to 6 times during the past 7 days

YRBSHS_66.LongName: During the past 7 days, how many times did you eat <u>fruit</u>? (Do <u>not</u> count fruit juice.)

Levels.1: I did not eat fruit during the past 7 days
Levels.2: 1 to 3 times during the past 7 days
Levels.3: 4 to 6 times during the past 7 days

YRBSHS_67.LongName: During the past 7 days, how many times did you eat <u>green salad</u>?

Levels.1: I did not eat green salad during the past 7 days
Levels.2: 1 to 3 times during the past 7 days
Levels.3: 4 to 6 times during the past 7 days

YRBSHS_68.LongName: During the past 7 days, how many times did you eat <u>potatoes</u>? (Do <u>not</u> count french fries, fried potatoes, or potato chips.)

Levels.1: I did not eat potatoes during the past 7 days
Levels.2: 1 to 3 times during the past 7 days
Levels.3: 4 to 6 times during the past 7 days

YRBSHS_69.LongName: During the past 7 days, how many times did you eat <u>carrots</u>?

Levels.1: I did not eat carrots during the past 7 days
Levels.2: 1 to 3 times during the past 7 days
Levels.3: 4 to 6 times during the past 7 days

YRBSHS_70.LongName: During the past 7 days, how many times did you eat <u>other vegetables</u>? (Do <u>not</u> count green salad, potatoes, or carrots.)

Levels.1: I did not eat other vegetables during the past 7 days
Levels.2: 1 to 3 times during the past 7 days
Levels.3: 4 to 6 times during the past 7 days

YRBSHS_71.LongName: During the past 7 days, how many times did you drink a <u>can, bottle, or glass of soda or pop</u>, such as Coke, Pepsi, or Sprite? (Do <u>not</u> count diet soda or diet pop.)

Levels.1: I did not drink soda or pop  during the past 7 days
Levels.2: 1 to 3 times during the past 7 days
Levels.3: 4 to 6 times during the past 7 days

YRBSHS_72.LongName: During the past 7 days, on how many days were you physically active for a total of <u>at least 60 minutes per day</u>? (Add up all the time you spent in any kind of physical activity that increased your heart rate and made you breathe hard some of the time.)

YRBSHS_73.LongName: On an average school day, how many hours do you watch TV?

Levels.1: I do not watch TV on an average school day

YRBSHS_74.LongName: On an average school day, how many hours do you play video or computer games or use a computer for something that is not school work? (Include activities such as Xbox, PlayStation, Nintendo DS, iPod touch, Facebook, and the Internet.)

Levels.1: I do not play video or computer games or use a computer for something that is not school work.

YRBSHS_75.LongName: In an average week when you are in school, on how many days do you go to physical education (PE) classes?

YRBSHS_76.LongName: During the past 12 months, on how many sports teams did you play? (Count any teams run by your school or community groups.)

YRBSHS_77.LongName: Have you ever been taught about AIDS or HIV infection in school?

YRBSHS_78.LongName: Has a doctor or nurse ever told you that you have asthma?
